duties_responsibilities.duty: Support system-level Power Distribution Network (PDN) design, analysis, and validation for Mac and Accessory products development.
Work with multi-functional teams to design and implement a power supply network solution, develop and validate impedance and droop targets, and verify the quality of the power supply.
Provide feedback to silicon and packaging teams on system integration tradeoffs, complete target impedance analysis, transient voltage droop, and phase margin/stability analysis.
Work closely with System Design teams to provide detailed layout strategy and guidelines during design execution phase.
Develop test-suites to perform system-level validation for evaluation of design margins on the power domains and offer PI support through specific project design process.
Drive initiatives that improve process, procedures, and result quality.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Masters with 5-7 years of experience, or PhD (preferred) with a minimum of 3-4 years of experience
